name: kshow.to Dark Theme by Duck
description: Dark theme based on Material Design colors.
additional_info:
Color scheme based on Material Design: https://material.io/design/color/dark-theme.html#properties

Some elements like ads or Disqus comments may still be light. If you see those I recommend getting an ad/tracker blocker.

Optimized for Firefox. If there are problems in other browsers, please let me know.
